title: Coverlet (USA), 1828
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: double cloth
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 233.7 x 203.2 cm (7 ft. 8 in. x 6 ft. 8 in.)
description: Bedcover in blue and white, reversible double cloth. Pattern of stylized detached flower clusters; border of grape vine design. Star in corner. At one side the date 1828 woven in and letter A.H. (?) – second letter not complete.

Technique: double cloth.
